about_the_game:
Gold Edition CarX Drift Racing Online gives you an advantage over your competitors. Stand out of the crowd, having been given unique customization capabilities, bonuses to your experience, 5 000 000 game currency at the start of the game.

The special Gold edition of CarX Drift Racing Online includes:

  • Unique special edition of Atlas GT available only in the Gold Edition

  • Unique special edition of Caravan G6 - Ghost Drifter

  • Double experience rates (x2)

  • Double currency earnings (x2)

  • 5,000,000 money as Start Bonus
